topic.title: How to Use Fonts for Asian Languages

body.p: For Asian languages you must use a font or a sequence of fonts that cover the needed character ranges. If the characters are not found, the # symbol is used.

When you specify a sequence of fonts, if the glyphs are not found in the first font the next font is selected until one covering all the glyphs is found. A common font sequence for Asian languages is used in the next example.
